name: Corresponding
description:
This game was made for the Ludum Dare 48 compo in 48 hours.

The theme was "Deeper and deeper", and I thought it was time I tried my hand at a narrative game. I love typing games as well, so I thought I would mix the two together. Corresponding is a sort of choose your own adventure, where the story is literally written by you. Your choice of words impact the story.

 

The story is very rough and unfinished. Like usual I spent all the time making game mechanics and building systems for content creation, but didn't leave enough time for content creation. The story was a last minute add, so don't expect too much.

   

I hope I was able to communicate the general idea with what is here.

How to play (Windows)

1. Download  "Corresponding (x86).zip".

2. Extract the game files to where you want the game.

3. Run the "Corresponding.exe" file in the extracted folder.
